tidbits.title: Global Financial Hub
tidbits.description: Hong Kong serves as a major global financial hub, known for its skyscrapers, bustling business districts, and robust financial services.

tidbits.title: Cultural Fusion
tidbits.description: The city boasts a vibrant cultural scene, blending Eastern and Western influences, seen in its cuisine, festivals, and dynamic arts and music.

tidbits.title: Stunning Skyline
tidbits.description: Hong Kong's skyline is iconic, with the Victoria Harbour offering breathtaking views of skyscrapers, creating a stunning visual spectacle.
